best music of all time

05 Feb 2005

That's right bitches. You have 11 tracks, now nominate the best 11 tracks of all your time. Not what other people perceive to be the best stuff ever. Just the soundtrack of your life. Nothing hard, apart from the decision part, I know you can do it, now add comments.... Oh and no using the same band twice!

Work in Progress:
Soulwax - Too Many DJ's (single)
Everclear - Amphetamine
Soundgarden - The Day I tried to live
Beatles - Yesterday
Nirvana - In Bloom
Oasis - Champagne Supernova
Queens of The Stone Age - Lost Art of Keeping A Secret
Foo Fighters - Everlong
Red Hot Chilli Peppers - Under The Bridge
Pixies - Where Is My Mind
Weezer - Only In Dreams
